entry.body: Property: Identifier (--) The id of the admin client for this permission.
Property: Boolean (true) If this admin client can approve its own clients.
Property: Boolean (true) If this admin client can create new clients.
Property: Boolean (true) If the admin client can read the given client.
Property: Boolean (true) If the admin client can remove the given client.
Property: Boolean (false) If the client in ersatz_id can substitute for the client in client_id.
Property: Boolean (true) If the admin client can write to the configuration of the client (i.e. update it).
Property: Identifier (--) The target of this permission. This permission grants access to this client_id.

Property: Identifier (--) The id of the client that can substitute for a given client. Permissions are where this relationship is given and if there is not a permission object relating a client and and ersatz client, then no substitutions can happen.
Note that a permission to substitute for a given client is created in the admin component using the set_ersatz command.
Property:Identifier (**) The unique identifier of this permission.
Permissions are grants for various operations between an admin client and its charges. Administrative clients also can grant the ability to substitute from one of its clients to an ersatz client.
